Interface AccountDataApi

      void openIdToken(java.lang.String userId, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> body, retrofit.Callback<java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>> callback)
      Gets a bearer token from the homeserver that the user can present to a third party in order to prove their ownership of the Matrix account they are logged into.

void openIdToken(@Path(value="userId")
